original_title: SLI kicks off Year 2024 with strategic theme
original_body_lines: Consumer Centricity through Focused Specialization’ will be the theme that underscores the journey of Sri Lanka Insurance Life and Sri Lanka Insurance General in the Year 2024. Determined to deliver another year of premium service under the above theme, Sri Lanka insurance commenced its business activities at its headquarters office in Colombo yesterday. Picture shows an SLI agent handing over her life insurance customer portfolio to SLI CEO Chandana Aluthgama, Acting Chairman (Director) Dushmantha Thotawatta and COO Priyantha Perera, at the event.
Asiri Port City Hospital (Pvt) Ltd recognized  as a primary business of strategic importance
